name: modporter-ai
description: AI-powered tool for converting Minecraft Java Edition mods to Bedrock Edition add-ons

scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:ai-engine
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../ai-engine && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: npm run dev:frontend & npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:ai-engine
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:ai-engine
